remarks: Lemma for ~ wemapso .  Transitivity.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
wemapso.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. A ( ( x ` z ) S ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. A ( w R z -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) } $.
